title: That's entertainment. Part 2
creator_credit: David Melnick, Saul Chaplin and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
brief_description: Fred Astaire and Gene Kelly cohost a stunning gallery of classic moments in MGM history. Features memorable performances by John Barrimore, Clark Gable, Greta Garbo and many others including the Marx Brothers, Abbot and Costello, Laurel and Hardy and the inimitable W C Fields. This video includes over ninety legendary superstars.
